function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of AI in predicting patient outcomes and disease diagnosis","Impact":"Potential misdiagnosis or incorrect predictions leading to improper patient treatment","Mitigation":"Validation of AI predictions by healthcare professionals, regular updates of AI algorithms based on new data","Technologies":"AI validation platforms, regular algorithm updates","People":"Patients, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, AI developers"},{"Description":"Remote monitoring of COVID-19 patients","Impact":"Delayed detection of deteriorating patient health, lack of immediate medical intervention","Mitigation":"Integration of remote monitoring with regular check-ins by healthcare professionals, clear guidelines for when to escalate patient care","Technologies":"Remote monitoring solutions, communication platforms for healthcare professionals","People":"COVID-19 patients, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, remote monitoring solution providers"},{"Description":"Use of data analytics for tracking population flow","Impact":"Potential invasion of privacy, misuse of location data","Mitigation":"Anonymization of data, transparent data usage policies, consent-based data collection","Technologies":"Data anonymization tools, consent management platforms","People":"General population","Owner":"Telecom operators, government authorities"}]}
